name: works-key
effect: Opens the front door of the Valley Windworks. Reusable.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A large key for operating the doors of the Valley Windworks in the canyon. It was held by a Team Galactic Grunt.
flavor_text.platinum: A large key for operating the doors of the Valley Windworks in the canyon. It was held by a Team Galactic Grunt.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: A large key for operating the doors of the Valley Windworks in the canyon. It was held by a Team Galactic Grunt.
